info.name: Rapid Capsule API Collection v2.0
info.description:
Complete API documentation for Rapid Capsule Telemedicine Platform with sample responses.

**Patient API**: https://api.rapidcapsule.com/api
**Admin API**: https://admin.rapidcapsule.com/admin-api

Created by Bassey Eyo (Founder & CTO)
Email: eyobassey@gmail.com

item.name: Patient API
item.description: Endpoints for patient users - authentication, profile, appointments, health checkups, prescriptions, pharmacy orders, and more.

item.name: Auth
item.description: Authentication endpoints for login, registration, password reset, and 2FA

response.name: Success
Success
Success

body.raw:

  "specialist_id": "507f1f77bcf86cd799439099",

  "category": "General Medicine",

  "meeting_type": "Video and audio",

item.name: Specialist API
item.description: Endpoints for healthcare specialists - prescriptions, pharmacy, wallet, appointments, and clinical notes

item.name: Specialist Prescriptions
item.description: Create and manage prescriptions for patients

body.raw:
{
  "patient_id": "507f1f77bcf86cd799439011",
  "items": [
    {
      "drug_name": "Amoxicillin",
      "generic_name": "Amoxicillin",
      "drug_strength": "500mg",
      "quantity": 21,
      "dosage": "1 capsule",
      "frequency": "3 times daily",
      "duration": "7 days",
      "instructions": "Take with food",
      "unit_price": 100
    }
  ],
  "delivery_type": "delivery",
  "clinical_notes": "Patient diagnosed with bacterial infection"
}
